oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The cow-calf separation debate: Implications for bovine practitioners
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mann, Sabine
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cow-calf contact
behavior
health
production
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this presentation is to introduce the topic of cow-calf separation in dairy cattle pertinent to the dairy prac足titioner. It includes background on the reasons given for and against cow-calf contact such as health, behavior, housing con足siderations and production effects. It will specifically provide insight into the available and ongoing research in cow-calf contact systems with a focus on the possible role of the bovine practitioner in the current debate. Knowledge gaps are identi足fied in almost all areas of importance to the producer and pro足vide an opportunity for involvement of the bovine practitioner in research and practical implementation.
